export default function Resume(){ return (

Marko Novaković

WEB DEVELOPER

Telephone: (571) 338-6735 E-mail: novakovicmarko87@gmail.com

EDUCATION

BSEE Degree

University of Niš
5 years study at Faculty of Electronic Engineering
Niš, Serbia

www.elfak.ni.ac.rs/en/departments/electronics
- Electronics
- Multimedia technologies Oct 2006 – Nov 2012

EXPERIENCE

Glimmernet Technologies, Bethesda, MD

Web developer & designer

  • Led the project development from start to finish
  • Responsible for communication with clients and ensuring that all requests are met
  • Responsible for designing and creating a cross-browser responsive websites based on Wordpress CMS
  • Advising on project estimation and finding most optimal solutions
  • Responsible for customizing Wordpress themes and plugins to fit project's needs
  • Creating new plugins to add specific functionalities to the websites.
  • Responsible for maintaining old websites (updating content and applying new designs and functionalities). Creating custom RSS feeds and template pages.
  • Adding functionalities (calculator, carousel, manipulate DOM) on website using jQuery.
  • Upload files to the server using FTP client such as FileZilla.

Aug 2017 - Present

HORISEN Marketing Technology, Niš, Serbia

Front-end developer

  • Responsible for creating cross browser responsive websites from PSD files.
  • Using CSS framework (Bootstrap) for grid and components, in some cases writing my own grid.
  • Applying functionality to webpage using JavaScript libraries such as jQuery.
  • Responsible for maintaining old websites (updating content and applying new designs and functions).
  • Working on team that updated company's CMS (Horisen CMS – HCMS 2.0).
  • Using GIT for keeping project in synchronization with backend developers. If needed change some content in MySQL database and create update script.
  • Upload les to the server using grunt to run rsync and sometimes over FTP with some FTP client such as FileZilla or WinSCP.

Dec 2013 – May 2017

ADITIONAL INFORMATION

Technical skills: HTML(5), CSS(3): Bootstrap, SASS, Java Script (jQuery), Wordpress, Familiar with PHP (Zend) and MySQL, Familiar with ReactJS, VueJS, NodeJS, Templates(ejs), BEM methodology, Cross browser compatibility, Responsive development

Tools: Version control software (Git and SVN), FTP clients (FileZilla or WinSCP), Grunt, Gulp, SASS compiler (Koala), Familiar with composer and bower, IDE (NetBeans), Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator

Languages: English, Serbian (native)

) }
